mdRecord.dcterms:description: Built on the site of the Royal Palace of the Kings of Bohemia, 1383-1485; abandoned 1485 and demolished early 20th century. Houses Smetana Hall concert venue and was the location of the Czechoslovak declaration of independence, October 1918. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Municipal_House [work]
